name: FantasyGolf
summary:
FantasyGolf has a new 2 player mode, both players tee off before next hit. All 12 holes on a course  are visible.
Challenge:  You start with course 1 and need to minimum PAR to unlock next course and so on... last course has a Christmas theme

Features
• All 12 holes visible/in place all time 
• 1-2 players
• Select ball color
• 2 modes in 2 player,  1: one player finish before next turn  2: both players hits by turn
​• 5 courses
​• 12 holes per course
​• Hole preview window
• Support for 2 generic & PS4 controllers
storyline:
Play 1/2 player mode or new 2 player mode where both players tee off.
You need PAR to open next course
